definition: tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: Bedding was strewn on the floor and dirty teacups stacked in a corner.
sentences.chinese: 寝具散在地板上，脏兮兮的茶具塞在角落里。

sentences.english: If this is the case you can have someone make you bedding with your exact pattern.
sentences.chinese: 如果是这样的话，你可以使你有你确切寝具格局。

sentences.english: I will bring my bedding out, and dry it in the sun, said Mr.
sentences.chinese: 我会把我的寝具移出来，在太阳下晒干，托德先生说。

sentences.english: I fold up the bedding and put it in the closet.
sentences.chinese: 我折迭寝具把它放在柜子里。

sentences.english: For example, Bed, Bath &Beyond has a clearance section where you can find all kinds of wonderful household items for a fraction of the original cost.
sentences.chinese: 例如，你可以在清仓甩卖点看到各类超值的卫浴寝具。

sentences.english: Thanks. I just bought a new bed which I want to match with some new bedding.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢，我刚买了新床，想再买点搭配的寝具。

definition: spring mattress (loanword from "Simmons" bedding company name)
